Search a database of amiibo's and grow your collection.

Search for a Character

Type a character’s name into the search bar, and then click on the search button. My application uses an API to return the results of every amiibo with that character’s name.

Mark an Amiibo as in Your Collection

Once the API returns all of the amiibos of the character you searched for, you can mark a specific amiibo as in your collection. All you need to do is check the checkbox next to the amiibo’s name.

Keep Adding to your Collection

Every time you mark an amiibo as being in your collection, that amiibo gets stored in your local storage. This means that every time you return to the application, your collection will still be available for you to see.
